God grant that you may have an abundant entrance into His kingdom, that Christ shall not be ashamed to own you, your wife, and your children. Be Christ's representatives, pure, holy, undefiled, sanctified to God in body, soul, and spirit. The Lord bless you and keep you sound, clean, pure in mind and practice. Then will rest upon you the heavenly benediction, "Enter thou into the joy of thy Lord."--Letter 51, 1899. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. Jan. 22, 1988. Entire Letter.
